panels.description: This dashboard show percentage of kvm pod memory consumption in regards to pod limit.

targets.expr: 100 *  sum by (pod) (label_replace(node_memory_Active_bytes{cluster_id="$cluster", cluster_type="workload_cluster"}, "pod", "$1", "node", "(.*)")) / on (pod) sum by (pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits_memory_bytes{cluster_type="management_cluster", namespace="$cluster", pod=~"worker.*"})

panels.title: Worker memory usage in regards to pod limit in percent.
Details for workload cluster $cluster (Only when workload cluster is selected)
